subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Slowing Memphis’s up-and-down transition offense, St. Louis managed to get the fleet Tigers to play at its more deliberate pace during the Billikens’ victory.
snippet: Slowing Memphis’s up-and-down transition offense, St. Louis managed to get the fleet Tigers to play at its more deliberate pace during the Billikens’ victory.
